column3: Latest; Siem Reap: Authorities said at around 3am on January 29
column5: an American tourist damaged an Cathay United Bank ATM in Kandal Market
column9: a 30-year-old American male was taken in by police
column10: but was too drunk to answer questions
column11: according to police.------UPDATE: The man told police he became angry after the ATM swallowed his card. He apologized
column12: signed a contract and agreed to pay for the damage
